meanings.sent1: The misprogramed robot kept bumping into walls.
meanings.sent2: The misprogramed computer displayed error messages constantly.
meanings.sent3: The misprogramed alarm clock thought it was a toaster!
meanings.sent4: Her misprogramed GPS led her straight into a dead-end street.
meanings.sent5: The misprogramed vending machine kept dispensing the wrong snacks.

meanings.definition: To set or adjust a program incorrectly or inaccurately.
meanings.sent1: He misprogramed the security system, causing it to lock everyone out.
meanings.sent2: She misprogramed the microwave timer, so her food burned.
meanings.sent3: The chef misprogramed the oven to bake ice cream instead of cake!
meanings.sent4: The scientist misprogramed the robot to dance instead of clean.
meanings.sent5: They misprogramed the elevator, making it stop on every floor.
